TITLE: Using AIPy in Task Mode
DESCRIPTION: Example of using AIPy in Task mode to get Reddit posts by simply describing the task in natural language.
SOURCE: https://github.com/knownsec/aipyapp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
>>> Get the latest posts from Reddit r/LocalLLaMA
......
......
>>> /done
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using AIPy in Python Mode
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates Python mode where the 'ai' function can be called with natural language instructions while working in a standard Python environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/knownsec/aipyapp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
>>> ai("Get the title of Google's homepage")
```

TITLE: Detailed LLM Configuration for DeepSeek API
DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive example of configuring the DeepSeek LLM with all available options, including model selection, API key, timeout settings, and token limits.
SOURCE: https://github.com/knownsec/aipyapp/blob/main/CONFIG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
[llm.deepseek]
type = "deepseek"
model = "deepseek-chat"
api_key = "ä½ çš„ DeepSeek API Key"
enable = true
default = false
timeout = 10
max_tokens = 8192
```

TITLE: Configuring AIPy with DeepSeek API
DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration file (aipy.toml) that sets up DeepSeek as the LLM provider with your API key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/knownsec/aipyapp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
[llm.deepseek]
type = "deepseek"
api_key = "Your DeepSeek API Key"
enable = true
default = true
```
